items.title: The best investors avoid ‘revenge trading’ and other raw emotions. Here’s how you can too.
items.description: It’s not stock charts; it’s your mindset. This veteran trader’s insider tips can sharpen your skills.

items.title: A luxury ‘phobia’ is gripping these consumers. It’s a red flag for brands like Chanel and Gucci.
items.description: In China, conspicuous consumption is out, and “local heroes” are in.

items.title: McDonald’s may bring its 1,057-calorie Big Arch to America soon. Why it could be a billion-dollar burger.
items.description: McDonald’s is just one of a number of fast-food and fast-casual chains going the plus-size route with their burgers.
